overview: The Magnificent Merlin the Marveloso is a nightclub sorcerer with the gift of hypno-magic, the unique power to turn people's wildest fantasies into reality. Again and again lustful volunteers from the audience are hypnotically transported into strange and erotic situations.
tagline: An obsessed magician hypnotically transports lustful volunteers into wild, exotic, orgiastic sex fantasies.
title: Illusions of Ecstasy
